item.title: Khover add a quote by Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
item.description: "Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself and know that everything in this life has a purpose." -- Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

item.title: Khover add a quote by Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
item.description: "The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours." -- Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

item.title: Khover add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science. He to whom the emotion is a stranger, who can no longer pause to wonder and stand wrapped in awe, is as good as dead —his eyes are closed. The insight into the mystery of life, coupled though it be with fear, has also given rise to religion. To know what is impenetrable to us really exists, manifesting itself as the highest wisdom and the most radiant beauty, which our dull faculties can comprehend only in their most primitive forms—this knowledge, this feeling is at the center of true religiousness." -- Albert Einstein
